titles.title: To amend section 334 of the Uruguay Round Agreements Act to clarify the rules of origin with respect to certain textile products.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/9/1998--Introduced. Amends the Uruguay Round Agreements Act to revise rules of origin for textile and apparel products to provide, for purposes of the customs laws and the administration of quantitative restrictions, that certain fabrics of silk, cotton, man-made fiber, or vegetable fiber, and certain other silk accessories shall be considered to originate in, and be the growth, product, or manufacture of, the country, territory, or possession in which the finishing operations for such products occur.
